meanings.definition: The territory or jurisdiction of an earl.
meanings.sent1: The earldoms were vast lands ruled by the earl.
meanings.sent2: She inherited several earldoms after her father passed away.
meanings.sent3: The earldoms had a picnic in the meadow to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent4: The earldoms stood proudly like mighty kingdoms of old.
meanings.sent5: The earldoms stretched as far as the eye could see, a realm of power and influence.

meanings.definition: The rank or title of an earl.
meanings.sent1: He was granted multiple earldoms for his loyalty to the king.
meanings.sent2: The earldoms gathered at the royal banquet to celebrate their titles.
meanings.sent3: The earldoms decided to have a race to determine the fastest noble.
meanings.sent4: The earldoms shone brightly in the court, symbols of honor and nobility.
meanings.sent5: The earldoms were respected by all, their authority unquestioned in the realm.
